channel.title: CVE Feed for shopware -- platform
channel.description: The latest CVEs for shopware -- platform

item.title: CVE-2021-37710|2024-08-04T01:23:01.529Z -- shopware -- platform
item.description: Shopware is an open source eCommerce platform. Versions prior to 6.4.3.1 contain a Cross-Site Scripting vulnerability via SVG media files. Version 6.4.3.1 contains a patch. As workarounds for older versions of 6.1, 6.2, and 6.3, corresponding security measures are also available via a plugin.

item.title: CVE-2021-37711|2024-08-04T01:23:01.658Z -- shopware -- platform
item.description: Versions prior to 6.4.3.1 contain an authenticated server-side request forgery vulnerability in file upload via URL. Version 6.4.3.1 contains a patch. As workarounds for older versions of 6.1, 6.2, and 6.3, corresponding security measures are also available via a plugin.

item.title: CVE-2021-37708|2024-08-04T01:23:01.658Z -- shopware -- platform
item.description: Shopware is an open source eCommerce platform. Versions prior to 6.4.3.1 contain a command injection vulnerability in mail agent settings. Version 6.4.3.1 contains a patch. As workarounds for older versions of 6.1, 6.2, and 6.3, corresponding security measures are also available via a plugin.

item.title: CVE-2021-37707|2024-08-04T01:23:01.507Z -- shopware -- platform
item.description: Shopware is an open source eCommerce platform. Versions prior to 6.4.3.1 contain a vulnerability that allows manipulation of product reviews via API. Version 6.4.3.1 contains a patch. As workarounds for older versions of 6.1, 6.2, and 6.3, corresponding security measures are also available via a plugin.

item.title: CVE-2021-37709|2024-08-04T01:23:01.522Z -- shopware -- platform
item.description: Shopware is an open source eCommerce platform. Versions prior to 6.4.3.1 contain a vulnerability involving an insecure direct object reference of log files of the Import/Export feature. Version 6.4.3.1 contains a patch. As workarounds for older versions of 6.1, 6.2, and 6.3, corresponding security measures are also available via a plugin.
